headline: Verizon Stock Has Been a Telecom Laggard. Why That Is Changing.
summary: An examination of the stock charts of  Verizon  and  AT&T  reveals a Trading Places pattern.  Today,  former telecom leader Verizon has fallen out of favor, and longtime dog AT&T has suddenly shot ahead.  Maybe a likelier outcome is just a higher stock price for Verizon.

headline: EMEA Data Center Colocation Market Forecast Report 2025-2030, Profiling Equinix, Iron Mountain, Hostdime, Nforce Entertainment, Altushost, Serverius, Telehouse, Verizon, and Centersquare
summary: The EMEA data center colocation market is set to expand from USD 29.751 billion in 2025 to USD 51.208 billion in 2030, driven by hyperscale demand and rapid digital transformation. Key insights include hyperscale growth, investments in digital infrastructure, and sustainable energy initiatives. Discover regional trends, strategic expansions, and future market dynamics that shape this rapidly growing sector. Explore how leading players like Equinix and Khazna are meeting evolving demands with sca

headline: AT&T (T) Up 5.4% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: AT&T (T) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: SCHD: Strong Dividend Grower Made Even Better With Writing Options
summary: Read how we use the option wheel on SCHD for providing more consistent 'income' every month, along with our core long position that sits back and collects the dividend passively.
